subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
-Addresses the legal framework to ensure its compliance with the UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities; develop an implementation-oriented National Disability Action Plan that will set out concrete actions that the Government of Egypt will take to ensure that the provisions of the Convention are translated into practice. 
- The National Action Plan implements a set of pilot projects targeting people with disabilities at the community level.
-Includes a communication component aimed at raising awareness on the rights of persons with disabilities among media professionals and to generate positive attitudes at the community level.
-The programme adopts a participative approach, ensuring the active involvement of disabled people organizations (DPOs), non-governmental organizations (NGOs) and families associations, and facilitating the establishment of a coalition of NGOs and DPOs
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Promote the Rights of PWDs
